title: Episode 311: Scents & Flavors: Syrian Cookbook
description: On this week's episode of ﻿Eat Your Words﻿, host Cathy Erway is joined by Charles Perry, a culinary historian who has written widely on cooking in the medieval Middle East. He is the editor and translator of *Scents and Flavors: A Syrian Cookbook (Library of Arabic Literature)*﻿, a popular 13th-century Syrian cookbook.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
